history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01018
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING THE USE OF BAYBAYIN IN ALL OFFICIAL LOGOS OF ALL GOVERNMENT AGENCIES, DEPARTMENT AND OFFICES
SHORT TITLE : Baybayin Act Of 2015
ABSTRACT : Defines baybayin as: the ancient traditional scripts of the indigenous people.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BATAOIL, LEOPOLDO N.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
